Accessory_AirDash1.description: An accessory that allows the player to dash in mid-air when equipped.

Accessory_AirDash2.description: An accessory that allows the player to perform double dashes in mid-air when equipped.

Accessory_JumpCount_Increase1.description: An accessory that allows the player to jump in mid-air when equipped.

Accessory_JumpCount_Increase2.description: An accessory that allows the player to perform double jumps in mid-air when equipped.

Accessory_JumpPower_Increase.description: An accessory that increases the player's jump power when equipped.

Accessory_Nonkilling.description: Pacifist's ring. The wearer's attacks will not reduce the target's Health below 1.

Accessory_TalentChecker.description: Glasses used to discern hidden Pal abilities. Displays Health, Attack and Defense stats on a scale of 0 to 100.

AdditionalInventory_001.description: A small pouch that allows you to carry additional items. Holding it increases your inventory slots.

AdditionalInventory_002.description: A modest pouch that allows you to carry additional items. Holding it increases your inventory slots.

AdditionalInventory_003.description: A large pouch that allows you to carry additional items. Holding it increases your inventory slots.

AdditionalInventory_004.description: A massive pouch that allows you to carry additional items. Holding it increases your inventory slots.

Altar.description: Offer a Slab depicting a Pal to summon a powerful Pal to your base. Adequate caution and battle readiness is paramount.

Arrow.description: Used with Old Bow. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.

Arrow_Fire.description: Arrows for shooting with Fire Bow and Fire Arrow Crossbow. Deals Fire damage. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.

Arrow_Poison.description: Arrows for shooting with Poison Bow and Poison Arrow Crossbow. It poisons any target it hits. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.

AssaultRifleBullet.description: Ammo for Assault Rifle and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Assembly Line to craft.

AutoMealPouch_Tier1.description: Unlocks a food slot in your inventory. Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier2.description: A decently sized pouch for holding food. Unlocks 2 food slots in your inventory. Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier3.description: A large pouch for holding food. Unlocks 3 food slots in your inventory. Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier4.description: An extremely large pouch for holding food. Unlocks 4 food slots in your inventory. Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

AutoMealPouch_Tier5.description: An extraordinarily large sack for storing food. Unlocks 5 food slots in your inventory. Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.

BaseCampBattleDirector.description: Bell that sets the alert status for Pals on base. Change Pal behavior to either attack invading enemies or focus entirely on work whenever you like.

BaseCampItemDispenser.description: A device that lets you freely access items from all chests in the base.

BaseCampWorkHard.description: Command your Pals to work on various things inside a base. You can allow or prohibit individual kinds of work.

Battle_Armor_Grade_01_Cloth.description: Protects against cold nights. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_01_Cloth_Cold.description: Cloth Outfit produced in cold regions. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_01_Cloth_Heat.description: Cloth Outfit produced in hot regions. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_02_Fur.description: Armor made from Leather. Its warmth and defense have been improved. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_02_Fur_Cold.description: Pelt Armor produced in cold regions. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_02_Fur_Heat.description: Pelt Armor produced in hot regions. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Copper.description: Armor made of metal. Somewhat heavy, but provides good defense. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Copper_Cold.description: Improved Metal Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Copper_Heat.description: Improved Metal Armor. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Iron.description: Armor made from high quality metal. Quite heavy, but provides excellent defense. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Iron_Cold.description: Improved Refined Metal Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_03_Iron_Heat.description: Improved Refined Metal Armor. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_04_Steal.description: Armor fully utilizing the latest technology. Boasts overwhelming defense. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_04_Steal_Cold.description: Improved Pal Metal Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_04_Steal_Heat.description: Improved Pal Metal Armor. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic.description: Armor developed by pushing the edge of technology. Boasts unparalleled defense. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic_Cold.description: Improved Plasteel Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic_Heat.description: Improved Plasteel Armor. Boasts high heat resistance. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Armor_Grade_05_Plastic_Weight.description: Improved Plasteel Armor. Increases carrying capacity. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Cloth.description: Cloth woven from Wool. Required to create armor.

Battle_Defense_BowGun.description: Assign a Pal with Handiwork suitability and it will protect a base using the crossbow.

Battle_Defense_MachineGun.description: Assign a Pal with Handiwork suitability and it will protect a base using the machine gun.

Battle_Defense_Missile.description: Assign a Pal with Handiwork suitability and it will protect a base using the missile launcher.

Battle_Glider_Grade_01.description: A glider for soaring through the air. Cheaply made, it isn't very fast.

Battle_Glider_Grade_02.description: A glider for soaring through the air. A mass produced commercial model, it’s decently fast. Can be made at High-Quality Workbench.

Battle_Glider_Grade_03.description: A glider for soaring through the air. With its capabilities improved, it can soar at high speed. Can be made at Production Assembly Line

Battle_Glider_Grade_04.description: A glider for soaring through the air. Its performance has been further improved, with increased speed and lift. Can be made at Production Assembly Line II.

Battle_GunPowder_Grade_02.description: Gunpowder used to fire ammunition. Required to make bullets. Can be made at High-Quality Workbench.

Battle_Helm_Grade_02_Fur.description: A beautiful feathered headband. Though improbable, it somehow protects its wearer from lethal head injuries. Requires Workbench to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_03_Copper.description: A helm made of metal. A reliable piece of armor that protects your head, and all the thoughts within. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_04_Iron.description: A helm made from high quality metal. Its sheen gives the wearer a greater sense of confidence. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_05_Steal.description: A helm made from Pal Metal Ingot. Envied for its immaculate quality, it is proof of a chosen warrior. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_Helm_Grade_06_Plastic.description: Helmet made of Plasteel. In addition to enhanced defense capabilities, its weight was also reduced. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_MeleeWeapon_Axe_Steal.description: An axe for chopping wood. It has achieved extraordinary sharpness thanks to Pal Metal.

Battle_MeleeWeapon_Bat.description: A Wooden Club for close range combat. Can beat a small Pal to a pulp if need be.

Battle_MeleeWeapon_Bat2.description: Baseball bat for close-range combat. Might be tough to get a home run with a Pal.

Battle_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe_Steal.description: A pickaxe for mining. It has achieved extraordinary efficiency thanks to Pal Metal.

Battle_MeleeWeapon_Sword.description: Sword for close-range combat. The blade is extremely sharp! Mightier than a pen, for sure. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_AssaultRifle.description: Mows down enemies with overwhelming force. It excels at rapid-fire and is well suited to taking down powerful foes. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow1.description: Primitive long range weapon. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow3.description: An enhanced bow that allows three arrows to be fired simultaneously. By some strange mechanism, it only consumes a single Arrow when fired.

Battle_RangeWeapon_BowGun.description: Fires an Arrow effortlessly. Though it takes time to load, it delivers a powerful shot. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_BowGun_Fire.description: A Crossbow that deals Fire damage. Requires Fire Arrow. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_BowGun_Poison.description: A Crossbow that inflicts poison on its target. Requires Poison Arrow. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow_Fire.description: A bow that deals Fire damage. Burns Pals with fire arrows, making them easier to capture. Requires Fire Arrow.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Bow_Poison.description: Frightening bow that poisons its target. Poisoned Pals are easier to capture. Requires Poison Arrow.

Battle_RangeWeapon_CompoundBow.description: A modernized bow. Capable of firing more powerful arrows.

Battle_RangeWeapon_FlameThrower.description: Flamethrower that fires long-range flame. Can set the enemy on fire. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line II.

Battle_RangeWeapon_GatlingGun.description: A Gatling Gun capable of rapid fire. Mows down enemies with suppressive fire. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line II.

Battle_RangeWeapon_GrenadeLauncher.description: Fires grenades that cause wide-ranging explosions. Useful when dealing with a large number of enemies. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line II

Battle_RangeWeapon_GuidedMissileLauncher.description: Fires missiles that automatically track and pursue enemies. Missiles explode upon impact, causing damage over a wide area.

Battle_RangeWeapon_HandGun.description: A handgun with improved capacity and rapid-fire capabilities. Has more immediate firepower than a Makeshift Handgun. Crafted at Weapon Workbench.

Battle_RangeWeapon_HomingSphereLauncher.description: Fires Pal Spheres that automatically home in on Pals. Requires Weapon Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_LaserRifle.description: A weapon that fires high-energy lasers. It has impressive firepower and is easy to handle. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line II.

Battle_RangeWeapon_OldRevolver.description: A slightly outdated revolving handgun. Compared to Handgun_default, it excels in single-shot power.

Battle_RangeWeapon_Rifle.description: A single-shot rifle. Takes time to load. What it lacks in capacity, it makes up for with sheer power. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line.

Battle_RangeWeapon_RocketLauncher.description: A Rocket Launcher that can fire a powerful round from long distances. Requires Weapon Assembly Line II to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_SemiAutoRifle.description: A rifle that allows for a certain degree of rapid fire. It’s easy to aim and has high firepower, making it effective for mid-range combat.

Battle_RangeWeapon_SemiAutoShotgun.description: A rapid-fire shotgun with immense power. Its close-range damage output is top-notch.

Battle_RangeWeapon_ShotGun.description: Wreaks havoc at close range. Can fire twice before reloading. Despite the limited load capacity, it still packs a punch. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line.

Battle_RangeWeapon_ShotGun_Multi.description: A high capacity, powerful shotgun. It has outstanding close range DPS. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line.

Battle_RangeWeapon_SphereLauncher.description: Innovative launcher that fires many Spheres simultaneously. Can easily capture a herd of Pals. Requires Weapon Assembly Line to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_SphereLauncher_Once.description: Can capture distant Pals. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

Battle_RangeWeapon_SubmachineGun.description: A submachine gun with exceptional rate of fire. It’s easy to handle and effective in close-range combat.

BeamSword.description: Beam Sword for close-range combat. Slices through opponents, burning them with a high-output laser.

BelieverFlagSet.description: Free Pal Alliance Standard and Free Pal Alliance Vertical Banner set. Proof of your victory over the Free Pal Alliance.

BlastFurnace4.description: Allows refinement of Hexolite. By growing in size, multiple Pals can collaborate to perform smelting. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

BreedFarm.description: Assign a male and a female Pal to produce eggs. Cake is required for breeding.

BuildableGoddessStatue.description: Make offerings to enhance the stats of the Player and their Pals.

CarbonFiber.description: A lightweight yet sturdy material. Used to create armor among other equipment.

Cauldron.description: Place in base to improve medicine manufacturing speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

CeilingLamp.description: Lights up dark areas below at a base.

Cement.description: Cement used for creating structures and more. Can be produced in a High-Quality Workbench.

Cloth2.description: Woven from large amounts of Wool. Required to create high quality armor. Can be made at High-Quality Workbench.

CompositeDesk.description: A facility that lets you combine multiple schematics to create more advanced ones.

Cooler.description: Cools the nearby area and protects against the heat.

CoolerBox.description: Small food vault. Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent food stored inside from spoiling.

CoolerPalFoodBox.description: A feeding box that can be kept cold. Assign an Ice Pal to it and the food inside will be less likely to spoil.

Crusher.description: Facility for breaking down Stone and Wood to exchange them for other materials. Requires Pal with the Watering suitability to spin the water turbine.

DamagedScarecrow.description: Training dummy shaped like a Pengullet.

DecalGunSet.description: Decal gun set. Allows crafting of a strange gun that paints a Pal decal where it is fired. Required ammo also becomes craftable.

DefenseWait.description: Pals assigned to it will watch for approaching enemies.

DefenseWall.description: Large defensive wall that protects from enemy invasions.

DefenseWall_Metal.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

DefenseWall_Wood.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

DimensionPalStorage.description: A facility for storing a large number of captured Pals. Any guild member can deposit or withdraw Pals. If you set it to private, it can serve as your personal Pal storage.

DismantlingConveyor.description: A dream-like facility that automatically butchers any Pal that is placed inside.

DisplayCharacter.description: Container for observing captured Pals. Pals inside cannot participate in battle or production, but they do not become hungry.

ElecBaton.description: Close range weapon that sends out an electric jolt upon contact. Pals are easier to capture when electrocuted. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

ElectricCooler.description: Cools the nearby area and protects against the heat. Improved range and cooling capabilities.

ElectricGenerator_Large.description: A power generator fueled by Electric Pals. Larger and with improved power generation efficiency.

ElectricHeater.description: Warms the nearby area and protects against the cold. Improved range and heating capabilities.

EnergyLauncherBullet.description: Ammo for the Plasma Cannon and any similar weapon.

EnergyRocketLauncher.description: Fires high-output energy projectiles. Causes an energy explosion upon impact.

EnergyStorage_Electric.description: A facility for storing excess electricity generated by the Power Generator.

Expedition.description: A facility that allows Pals to be sent on expeditions to places like dungeons. The dispatched Pals engage in battles and gather items, bringing back resources to the base.

Factory_Hard_04.description: An Assembly Line for producing items and gear. Advanced machinery has been introduced, enabling high-speed production. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Factory_Money.description: An Assemby Line that manufactures Money. The work puts a strain on the mind, causing a decrease in Pal's SAN value. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Farm_SkillFruits.description: A farm where Skillfruits can be cultivated. By planting the original fruit in the ground, multiple fruits of the same type can be harvested.

FireCultFlagSet.localized_name: Brothers of the Eternal Pyre Flag Set
FireCultFlagSet.description: Brothers of the Eternal Pyre Standard and Brothers of the Eternal Pyre Vertical Banner set. Proof of your victory over the Brothers of the Eternal Pyre.

FishingSet1.description: Beginner-friendly fishing rod and bait set. Once you craft both, you'll be able to fish for Pals near bodies of water.

FlamethrowerBullet.description: Flamethrower fuel. Ammo for the Flamethrower and similar weapons.

FlourMill.description: Facility for milling Wheat to produce Flour. Requires Pal with the Watering suitability to spin the water turbine.

FlowerBed.description: Place in base to improve gathering speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Fountain.description: Place in base to improve watering speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

FragGrenade.description: A Frag Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing damage to enemies.

FragGrenade_Dark.description: A Dark Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Dark damage to enemies.

FragGrenade_Dragon.description: A Dragon Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Dragon damage to enemies.

FragGrenade_Elec.description: A Shock Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, electrocuting everything in the blast radius.

FragGrenade_Fire.description: A Incendiary Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, setting the surrounding area on fire.

FragGrenade_Ground.description: A Ground Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Ground damage to enemies.

FragGrenade_Ice.description: A Ice Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, freezing the surrounding area.

FragGrenade_Leaf.description: A Grass Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Grass damage to enemies.

FragGrenade_Super.description: An improved frag grenade. It explodes a few seconds after being thrown, dealing massive damage to enemies.

FragGrenade_Water.description: A Water Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates a few seconds after being thrown, dealing Water damage to enemies.

FurnitureSet_1.description: Decorative furniture set. Place furniture in your living space and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_10.description: Decorative furniture set. Place to keep somewhere off limits.

FurnitureSet_11.description: Decorative furniture set. No roads mean no traffic control.

FurnitureSet_12.description: Decorative furniture set. No roads mean no traffic control.

FurnitureSet_13.description: Decorative furniture set. Match with metal structures and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_14.description: Decorative furniture set. Match with metal structures and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_15.description: Decorative furniture set. Place in your base and dream about living a life of luxury.

FurnitureSet_16.description: Decorative furniture set. Essentially for making sure you look good.

FurnitureSet_17.description: Decorative furniture set. Place on a foundation in your base for that homey feel.

FurnitureSet_18.description: Decorative furniture set. Gives the air of luxury to your base.

FurnitureSet_19.description: Decorative furniture set. Use with an antique desk.

FurnitureSet_2.description: Set of wooden cabinets that look at home in a tavern. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_20.description: Decorative furniture set. Can't actually be used to stay clean.

FurnitureSet_21.description: Antique storage furniture set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_22.description: Antique storage cabinet set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_23.description: Decorative furniture set. Doesn't actually tell time.

FurnitureSet_24.description: Decorative furniture set. Use with an antique chair.

FurnitureSet_25.description: Decorative furniture set. Can't be used for its original purpose.

FurnitureSet_26.description: Decorative furniture set. Your Pals will keep on working.

FurnitureSet_27.description: Street lamp set to provide illumination. Requires electricity to light.

FurnitureSet_28.description: Brick fireplace set to provide illumination. Must be lit with fire.

FurnitureSet_29.description: Antique lamp set to provide illumination. Requires electricity to light.

FurnitureSet_3.description: Decorative furniture set. Set up a bar and enjoy life with your Pals.

FurnitureSet_30.description: Metal shelf set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_31.description: Decorative furniture set. Spruces up the outside of your base.

FurnitureSet_32.description: Decorative furniture set. Gives an air of stately elegance to your base.

FurnitureSet_4.description: Decorative furniture set. Place plants on your base's walls for a splash of color.

FurnitureSet_5.description: Decorative furniture set. Not suitable for doing keg stands.

FurnitureSet_6.description: Container furniture set. Can store items.

FurnitureSet_7.description: Decorative furniture set. Leather screams luxury.

FurnitureSet_8.description: Decorative furniture set. Apparently a priceless artifact in more civilized times.

FurnitureSet_9.description: Decorative furniture set. Place plants around your base for a splash of color.

FurnitureSet_Japanese.description: Japanese-style decorative furniture set. Transform your base into a traditional Japanese haven.

GatlingBullet.description: Ammo for the Gatling Gun and similar weapons.

Glass_houseset.description: Set for building bases using glass. Allows building of glass foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

GlobalPalStorage.description: A facility that can store the genetic data of Pals and allows you to reconstruct them from this data. The stored genetic data can also be transferred to other worlds.

GrapplingGun.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. It allows for easy movement between places with varying elevation.

GrapplingGun2.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. Since it's upgraded, it now has greater range.

GrapplingGun3.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. Using data from prototype versions, its capabilities have been further increased.

GrapplingGun4.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. As a result of research, it has achieved overwhelming mobility.

GrenadeBullet.description: Ammo for the Grenade Launcher and similar weapons.

GuildChest.description: A chest that can instantly send and receive items through subspace. The items inside are shared across all bases where it is placed.

HandTorch.description: Lights up dark areas and keeps you warm. Can also be used for close range combat in a pinch. Crafts Hand-Held Torch atPrimitive Workbench.

HandgunBullet.description: Ammo for Handgun and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

Headstone.description: A gravestone that can be inscribed with text. Use it for recording purposes.

Heater.description: Warms the nearby area and protects against the cold.

Homeward.description: Transports you to the nearest base. Cannot be used in dungeons and other similar locations.

HugeKitchen.description: Needed for cooking food. By becoming larger, multiple Pals can cooperate to cook together. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

HunterFlagSet.description: Rayne Syndicate Standard and Rayne Syndicate Vertical Banner set. Proof of your victory over the Rayne Syndicate.

IceCrusher.description: Facility that crushes Ore and converts it into other materials. Requires a power supply and a Pal with Cooling suitability, but it's very efficient.

Infra_ElectricGenerator_Grade_01.description: Electric Pals at the base can now store electricity, allowing the use of electric facilities.

Infra_ElectronicCircuit.description: Circuit Board required to create precision equipment. Can be made at Production Assembly Line.

Infra_ItemChest_Grade_01.description: Used to store items. Place at a base and Pals with Transporting suitability will automatically carry items to it.

Infra_ItemChest_Grade_02.description: Can be used to store more items. Pals with Transporting suitability will automatically carry items to it.

Infra_ItemChest_Grade_03.description: Can be used to store even more items. Pals with Transporting suitability will automatically carry items to it.

Infra_MachineParts.description: Necessary for building various facilities. Can be made with a Primitive Workbench.

Infra_PalBed_Grade_01.description: Pals at base recover SAN when sleeping in beds at night. Without a bed, Pals cannot sleep soundly, and no SAN is recovered.

Infra_PalBed_Grade_02.description: Pals sleep more soundly, improving the amount of Health and SAN recovered while sleeping.

Infra_PlayerBed_Grade_01.description: Human bed. Sleeping restores Health. Sleep at night and time will pass until morning. Cannot sleep unless built under a roof.

Infra_PlayerBed_Grade_02.description: Soft bed with improved restorative capabilities. Cannot sleep unless built under a roof.

ItemBooth.description: A facility for selling items. By setting products in the sales list, you can sell items to other players. Assign an Ice Pal to it and the food inside will be less likely to spoil.

ItemChest_04.description: Stores items. Quite sturdy, with plenty of storage space. It is useful as a large, secure storage box.

JapaneseStyle_houseset.description: Set for building bases using Japanese-style architecture. Allows building of Japanese-style foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

Katana.description: Katana for close-range combat. Slices through with razor-sharp precision, cutting cleanly in one strike.

Lab.description: A facility for conducting research on the various tasks of Pals. By assigning tasks to Pals in this facility, research progresses, granting various benefits.

Lamp.description: Lights up dark areas at a base.

Lantern.description: A lantern that can be attached to the hip. It lights up automatically at night. Just one is enough to find your way in the dark.

LargeCeilingLamp.description: Lights up large areas below at a base.

LargeLamp.description: Lights up large areas at a base.

LaserBullet.description: Ammo used by the Laser Rifle and similar weapons.

LaserGatlingBullet.description: Ammo for the Laser Gatling Gun and any similar weapon.

LaserGatlingGun.description: Fires beam-like energy blasts at high speed. Its overwhelming firepower can take down multple enemies at once.

LauncherBullet.description: Ammo for the Rocket Launcher and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Assembly Line II to craft.

Launcher_Meteor.description: A phenomenal weapon that fires a meteor. Upon striking its target, it creates an explosion similar to a meteorite impact. Crafted at Weapon Assembly Line.

MakeshiftAssaultRifle.description: An assault rifle handmade from scraps. It excels in rate of fire and long range, but its single-shot power is low.

MakeshiftHandgun.description: A handgun created from spare parts. Relatively well suited for close quarters combat, but can only fire one shot before needing to reload. Crafted at Weapon Workbench.

MakeshiftShotgun.description: A shotgun handmade from scraps. It has a short range but excels in close-range combat

MakeshiftSubmachineGun.description: A submachine gun handmade from scraps. It excels in rate of fire, but its single-shot power is low.

ManualElectricGenerator.description: A facility that converts rotational motion into electrical energy. The efficiency is low, and the Pals working here will experience a decrease in SAN value, but they will gain experience points.

MeatCutterKnife.description: Knife for butchering Pals. When equipped, the Pet command becomes Butcher. Butchered Pals will be gone for good.

MedicalPalBed_04.description: A fluffy bed that Pals can get a good rest on. Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night. Even large Pals can sleep soundly on a bed like this.

MedicalPalBed_05.description: A healing pod for Pals. Used when Pals are injured or to rest at night. Thanks to technological advancements, the healing amount has increased.

MedicineFacility_03.description: A facility for making medicine to cure Pals' illnesses. With advanced technology, it can also create unknown medicines. Assign the task to a Pal capable of pharmacy work.

MetalDetector.description: Holding it allows you to detect hidden ores nearby. It marks the metal when close to the ore, but the mark disappears if you move away.

Metal_Gate.description: Metal gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

Metal_houseset.description: Set for building bases using metal. Allows building of metal foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

MiningTool.description: Place in base to improve mining speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

MissileBullet.description: Ammo for the Guided Missile Launcher and similar weapons.

MonsterFarm.description: Ranch for raising sheep and fowl-like Pals. Assign Pals with the appropriate work suitability to the ranch to automatically produce items.

MultiElectricHatchingPalEgg.description: Device for incubating Pal eggs. While power supply is required, it allows multiple eggs to be incubated simultaneously at the optimal temperature.

Musket.description: Simple, old fashioned gun. Fires a single, powerful shot at the expense of a long reload time. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

NinjaFlagSet.description: Moonflower Standard and Moonflower Vertical Banner set. Proof of your victory over the Moonflowers.

OctaviaSet01.description: [ULTRAKILL Collab] A set containing V1 Armor and Marksman Revolver.

OctaviaSet02.description: [ULTRAKILL Collab] A set containing V2 Armor and Core Eject Shotgun.

OilPump.description: Equipment required to extract Crude Oil from oil fields. Requires a power supply to operate.

OlympicCauldron.description: Place in base to improve fire-making speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

OperatingTable.description: A facility where surgery can be performed on Pals to change their gender or passive skills.

PALBOX.description: Facility for storing captured Pals. Pals inside gradually recover Health. The area around this structure will become your base.

PalBooth.description: A facility for selling Pals. By setting Pals in the sales list, you can sell them to other players. Assign an Ice Pal to it and the food inside will be less likely to spoil.

PalFoodBox.description: Place food here, and Pals at the base will eat from it.

PalMedicineBox.description: A shelf for storing medicine. Sick Pals will come here to take their medicine. Be sure to keep the medicine stocked.

PalRevive.description: A potion that revives a Pal that has been injured and is unable to move.

PalSphere_Exotic.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Boasting incredible performance, it can capture Pals that fall outside regular standards.

Plastic.description: Plasteel created by processing Crude Oil and metal. Can be produced in a Electric Furnace.

PoliceFlagSet.description: PIDF Standard and PIDF Vertical Banner set. Proof of your victory over the PIDF.

Polymer.description: Made from refined oil. Required for producing various advanced items such as rifles.

Potion_Extreme.description: Medicine that heals wounds over time. Extremely high quality, it rapidly restores HP before your eyes.

Product_Axe_Grade_01.description: An axe for cutting wood. Made from stone, it's not very sharp.

Product_Axe_Grade_02.description: An axe for cutting wood. Made from metal, its sharpness has improved. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Product_Axe_Grade_03.description: An axe for cutting wood. Made from high quality metal, its sharpness has improved even further. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.

Product_CoalPit.description: Facility for producing Coal. Digging Coal is grueling physical work. Leave it to a Pal that is good at mining.

Product_Cooking_Grade_01.description: Used to make simple food or provide meager warmth and light.

Product_Cooking_Grade_02.description: Can efficiently prepare more varieties of foods.

Product_Cooking_Grade_03.description: Needs electricity but can prepare high-quality food more efficiently. Requires Pal with Kindling suitability.

Product_CopperPit.description: Facility for producing Ore. Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

Product_CopperPit_2.description: Facility for producing large quantities of Ore. Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

Product_Factory_Hard_Grade_01.description: Produces faster than Primitive Workbench. Requires Pal with Handiwork trait.

Product_Factory_Hard_Grade_02.description: Needs electricity but produces items at a faster pace. Requires Pal with Handiwork trait.

Product_Factory_Hard_Grade_03.description: Needs electricity but produces items at an even faster pace. Requires Pal with Handiwork trait.

Product_Farm_Berries.description: Can produce berries at a base. Requires Pal with Planting, Watering, and Gathering suitabilities.

Product_Farm_Carrot.description: A farm where you can grow Carrot. It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

Product_Farm_Lettuce.description: Farm for producing lettuce. Requires Pal with Planting, Watering, and Gathering suitabilities.

Product_Farm_Onion.description: A farm where you can grow Onion. It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

Product_Farm_Potato.description: A farm where you can grow Potato. It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

Product_Farm_tomato.description: Farm for producing tomatoes. Requires Pal with Planting, Watering, and Gathering suitabilities.

Product_Farm_wheat.description: Use it to grow ingredients for Bread. Requires Pal with Planting, Watering, and Gathering suitabilities.

Product_Ingot_Grade_02_Iron.description: Uses Ore and Coal to produce Refined Ingots.

Product_Ingot_Grade_03_Steal.description: Allows refinement of Pal Metal Ingot.

Product_Medicine_Grade_01.description: Can produce simple medicine. Requires Pal with Medicine Production trait.

Product_Medicine_Grade_02.description: Needs electricity but can produce higher-quality medicine. Requires Pal with Medicine Production trait.

Product_Pickaxe_Grade_01.description: A pickaxe used for mining. Made from stone, the efficiency is questionable.

Product_Pickaxe_Grade_02.description: A pickaxe used for mining. Made from metal, its durability and efficiency have improved. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Product_Pickaxe_Grade_03.description: A pickaxe used for mining. Its durability and efficiency have further improved. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.

Product_QuartzPit.description: A facility for producing Pure Quartz. Mining Pure Quartz is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

Product_StationDeforest.description: Can produce wood at a base. Requires Pal with Lumbering suitability.

Product_StonePit.description: Can produce stone at a base. Requires Pal with Mining suitability.

Product_SulfurPit.description: Facility for producing Sulfur. Digging Sulfur is grueling physical work. Leave it to a Pal that is good at mining.

Product_WeaponFactory_Dirty_Grade_01.description: Produces simple mechanical weapons. Requires Pal with Handiwork suitability.

Product_WeaponFactory_Dirty_Grade_02.description: Needs electricity but produces weapons and ammunition at a faster pace. Requires Pal with Handiwork trait.

Product_WeaponFactory_Dirty_Grade_03.description: Needs electricity but produces weapons and ammunition at an even faster pace. Requires Pal with Handiwork trait.

Product_WorkBench_SkillUnlock.description: Produces items that allow Pals to use Partner Skills.

Refrigerator.description: Large food vault. Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent food stored inside from spoiling.

ReinforcedArrow.description: Enhanced arrows designed for use with the Compound Bow.

RepairKit.description: Tools for repairing structures. Use it on destroyed structures to repair them.

RifleBullet.description: Ammo for Single-Shot Rifle and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

RoughBullet.description: Ammo for Musket, Makeshift Handgun and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

SFArmor.description: Armor made of Hexolite. Possesses overwhelming durability and defense.

SFArmorCold.description: Improved Hexolite Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates.

SFArmorHeat.description: Improved Hexolite Armor. Boasts high heat resistance.

SFArmorWeight.description: Improved Hexolite Armor. Increases carrying capacity.

SFArrow.description: Arrows made of Hexolite material, designed for use with the Advanced Bow.

SFBow.description: A bow reconstructed with advanced technology. Capable of firing extremely powerful arrows.

SFHelmet.description: Helmet made of Hexolite. Combines incredible strength and lightness.

SF_houseset.description: Set for building bases using futuristic architecture. Allows building of futuristic foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

SanityDecrease1.description: A device that generates alpha waves to relax Pals. It slows the rate at which the SAN value of allies at the base decreases. Placing more than two will not have any additional effect.

ScientistFlagSet.localized_name: PAL Genetic Research Unit Flag Set
ScientistFlagSet.description: PAL Genetic Research Unit Standard and PAL Genetic Research Unit Vertical Banner set. Proof of your victory over the PAL Genetic Research Unit.

Shield_01.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. It automatically repair itself after not taking damage for a while.

Shield_02.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. The new model has been improved, enhancing its defense. Can be made at High-Quality Workbench.

Shield_03.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Modifications have enhanced its effectiveness even further. Can be made at Production Assembly Line.

Shield_04.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Through repeated testing, the highest quality has been achieved. Can be made at Production Assembly Line II.

Shield_05.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. As a result of further experiments, ultimate quality has been achieved. Can be made at Production Assembly Line II.

Shield_SF.description: Strange shield made with advanced technology. It automatically repair itself after not taking damage for a while.

ShotGunBullet.description: Ammo for shotguns and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.

Silo.description: Place in base to improve planting speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

SkillUnlock_AmaterasuWolf_Dark.description: Saddle for safely riding Kitsun Noct.

SkillUnlock_BadCatgirl.description: A shotgun for Nyafia to hold. Activate its Partner Skill, and Nyafia will unleash a barrage of shotgun blasts at nearby enemies.

SkillUnlock_BirdDragon_Ice.description: Saddle for safely riding Vanwyrm Cryst.

SkillUnlock_BlackPuppy.description: Harness for Smokie. Activate its Partner Skill to detect the location of nearby Chromite.

SkillUnlock_Carbunclo.description: Submachine gun made specifically for Lifmunk. Activate its Partner Skill, and Lifmunk will ride on your head and fire at enemies.

SkillUnlock_ColorfulBird.description: Gloves for gently holding Tocotoco. Activate its Partner Skill to hold Tocotoco and use it to fire explosive eggs.

SkillUnlock_Deer_Ground.description: Saddle for safely riding Eikthyrdeer Terra.

SkillUnlock_DreamDemon.description: Collar for Daedream. If Daedream is in your team, it will stay by your side and attack enemies in tandem.

SkillUnlock_DrillGame.description: Headband for Digtoise. Activate its Partner Skill to make Digtoise spin at high speed, allowing it to more efficiently drill through rock.

SkillUnlock_Eagle.description: Gloves for gently holding on to Galeclaw's legs. If Galeclaw is in your team, it can be used as a glider.

SkillUnlock_ElecPanda.description: Makes Grizzbolt fire a minigun when ridden.

SkillUnlock_FairyDragon_Water.description: Saddle for safely riding Elphidran Aqua.

SkillUnlock_FengyunDeeper_Electric.description: Saddle for safely riding Fenglope Lux.

SkillUnlock_FireKirin_Dark.description: Saddle for safely riding Pyrin Noct.

SkillUnlock_FlowerDinosaur_Electric.description: Saddle for safely riding Dinossom Lux.

SkillUnlock_FlowerRabbit.description: Collar for Flopie. If Flopie is in your team, it will stay by your side and automatically gather nearby items.

SkillUnlock_FlyingManta.description: Gloves for gently holding on to Celaray's fins. If Celaray is in your team, it can be used as a glider.

SkillUnlock_GrassMammoth_Ice.description: Saddle for safely riding Mammorest Cryst.

SkillUnlock_GrassPanda.description: Makes Mossanda fire a grenade launcher when ridden.

SkillUnlock_GrassPanda_Electric.description: Makes Mossanda Lux fire a grenade launcher when ridden.

SkillUnlock_HadesBird_Electric.description: Saddle for safely riding Helzephyr Lux.

SkillUnlock_Hedgehog.description: Rubber gloves for handling Jolthog. Activate its Partner Skill to throw Jolthog as a shock grenade.

SkillUnlock_Hedgehog_Ice.description: Rubber gloves for handling Jolthog Cryst. Activate its Partner Skill to throw Jolthog Cryst as an ice grenade.

SkillUnlock_Horus_Water.description: Saddle for safely riding Faleris Aqua.

SkillUnlock_IceHorse_Dark.description: Saddle for safely riding Frostallion Noct.

SkillUnlock_JetDragon.description: Makes Jetragon fire missiles when ridden.

SkillUnlock_KingAlpaca_Ice.description: Saddle for safely riding Kingpaca Cryst.

SkillUnlock_KingBahamut_Dragon.description: Saddle for safely riding Blazamut Ryu.

SkillUnlock_Kitsunebi.description: Harness for holding Foxparks. Activate its Partner Skill to hold Foxparks and attack using it as a flamethrower.

SkillUnlock_Kitsunebi_Ice.description: Harness for holding Foxparks Cryst. Activate its Partner Skill to hold Foxparks Cryst and release freezing air to attack.

SkillUnlock_LazyDragon.description: Makes Relaxaurus fire a missile launcher when ridden.

SkillUnlock_LazyDragon_Electric.description: Makes Relaxaurus Lux fire a missile launcher when ridden.

SkillUnlock_Manticore_Dark.description: Saddle for safely riding Blazehowl Noct.

SkillUnlock_Monkey.description: Assault rifle made specifically for Tanzee. Activate its Partner Skill, and Tanzee will enter gunner mode and begin shooting at nearby enemies.

SkillUnlock_MushroomDragon_Dark.description: Saddle for safely riding Shroomer Noct.

SkillUnlock_NegativeOctopus.description: Gloves for gently holding on to Killamari's legs. If Killamari is in your team, it can be used as a glider.

SkillUnlock_Penguin.description: Rocket launcher for launching Pengullet. Activate its Partner Skill to fire Pengullet and damage enemies. After firing, Pengullet will become incapacitated.

SkillUnlock_RaijinDaughter.description: Collar for Dazzi. If Dazzi is in your team, it will stay by your side and attack enemies in tandem.

SkillUnlock_RaijinDaughter_Water.description: Collar for Dazzi Noct. If Dazzi Noct is in your team, it will stay by your side and attack enemies in tandem.

SkillUnlock_SakuraSaurus_Water.description: Saddle for safely riding Broncherry Aqua.

SkillUnlock_Serpent_Ground.description: Saddle for safely riding Surfent Terra.

SkillUnlock_SkyDragon_Grass.description: Saddle for safely riding Quivern Botan.

SkillUnlock_Suzaku_Water.description: Saddle for safely riding Suzaku Aqua.

SkillUnlock_Umihebi_Fire.description: Saddle for safely riding Jormuntide Ignis.

SkillUnlock_VolcanicMonster_Ice.description: Saddle for safely riding Reptyro Cryst.

SkillUnlock_WeaselDragon_Fire.description: Saddle for safely riding Chillet Ignis.

SkillUnlock_WindChimes.description: Gloves for gently holding on to Hangyu's arms. If Hangyu is in your team, it can be used as a glider.

SkillUnlock_WindChimes_Ice.description: Gloves for gently holding on to Hangyu Cryst's arms. If Hangyu Cryst is in your team, it can be used as a glider.

SkillUnlock_Yeti_Grass.description: Saddle for safely riding Wumpo Botan.

SkinChange.description: Pal Dressing Facility. Give your Pals a new look! Skins obtained inside and outside the game can be applied here!

Snowman.description: Place in base to improve cooling speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Spa.description: Pals recover SAN while in a Hot Spring.

Spa2.description: Pals recover plenty of SAN while in the hot spring.

Spear.description: Useful for close-range combat. Its length allows you to stand further away when attacking.

Spear_2.description: Useful for close-range combat. The metal tip enhances its striking power. Requires High-Quality Workbench to craft.

Spear_3.description: Useful for close-range combat. The high-quality metal tip enhances its striking power. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.

Spear_ForestBoss.description: The spear cherished by Lily. Punishes those who neglect their Pals.

Special_ElectricHatchingPalEgg.description: Device for incubating Pal eggs. Requires electricity, but automatically keeps the inside of the incubator at appropriate temperatures.

Special_HatchingPalEgg.description: Place a Pal Egg inside to incubate it.

Special_PalRankUp.description: Combines several Pals of the same type to create a higher-ranked version.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_01.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. This basic model is only effective on low level Pals.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_02.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Its capabilities have been improved, allowing it to catch a wider range of Pals. Requires Sphere Workbench to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_03.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Able to capture moderately powerful Pals. Requires Sphere Workbench to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_04.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Enhanced capabilities allow it to capture even more powerful Pals. Requires Sphere Assembly Line to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_05.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Not many Pals can escape its highly efficient design. Requires Sphere Assembly Line II to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_06.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Very few Pals can escape its perfected design. Requires Sphere Assembly Line II to craft.

Special_PalSphere_Grade_07.description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Almost no Pals can escape its flawless design. Requires Sphere Assembly Line II to craft.

Special_SphereFactory_Black_Grade_01.description: Produces Spheres for capturing Pals. Requires Pal with Handiwork suitability.

Special_SphereFactory_Black_Grade_02.description: Creates Pal Spheres at a faster pace. Requires Pal with Handiwork suitability.

Special_SphereFactory_Black_Grade_03.description: Creates Pal Spheres at an even faster pace. Requires Pal with Handiwork suitability.

SphereFactory_Black_04.description: An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. Advanced machinery has been introduced, allowing for the production of spheres at high speed. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

SphereModule_Curve.description: Equipping it causes the sphere to spin with a curved trajectory. It becomes easier to catch Pals off guard, and increases capture power.

SphereModule_Curve2.description: Equipping it adds a slider spin to the sphere. The sphere curves at a sharp angle, making it easier to catch Pals off guard and increasing capture power.

SphereModule_Heavy.description: Equipping it makes the sphere heavier, reducing its range but increasing its capture power.

SphereModule_Homing.description: Equipping it makes the sphere home in on Pals, further increasing capture power.

SphereModule_Sniper.description: Equipping it increases the sphere's range, allowing it to sharply capture Pals and enhancing capture power.

SphereModule_Sniper2.description: Equipping it significantly increases the sphere's range, allowing it to sharply capture Pals and enhancing capture power.

StainlessSteel.description: An alloy of Chromite, Ingot, and Hexolite Quartz. Used as materials for advanced equipment and structures.

Stone_Gate.description: Stone gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

Stone_houseset.description: Set for building bases using stone. Allows building of stone foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

Stump.description: Place in base to improve logging speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

TableDresser01_Stone.description: Dresser useful for giving yourself a remake. Allows players to edit their appearance.

ToolBoxV1.description: Place in base to improve handiwork speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Torch.description: Place it at a base to light the surrounding area.

TransmissionTower.description: Place in base to improve electricity generating speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Trap_LegHold.description: Immobilizes those who step on it. Only effective on small Pals or humans.

Trap_LegHold_Big.description: Immobilizes those who step on it. Only effective on large Pals.

Trap_MineElecShock.description: Electrocutes those who step on it. Electrocuted Pals are easier to capture.

Trap_MineFreeze.description: Freezes those who step on it. Frozen Pals are easier to capture.

Trap_Noose.description: Catches Pals that pass through. Only effective on small Pals and humans.

Unlock_Picking_Tier1.description: No key? No problem! These tools will allow you to try and pry open any treasure chest that would normally require a Copper Key.

Unlock_Picking_Tier2.description: No key? No problem! These tools will allow you to try and pry open any treasure chest that would normally require a Silver Key.

Unlock_Picking_Tier3.description: No key? No problem! These tools will allow you to try and pry open any treasure chest that would normally require a Gold Key.

WallSignboard.description: A signboard to write on. Can be hung on walls.

WallTorch.description: Place it on a wall to light the surrounding area.

WeaponFactory_Dirty_04.description: An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition. Advanced machinery has been introduced, enabling high-speed weapon production. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Wood_Gate.description: Wooden gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

Wooden_houseset.description: Set for building bases using wood. Allows building of wooden foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

Wooden_ladder.description: A ladder that allows you to climb to a slightly higher place.

WorkSpeedIncrease1.description: A device that emits beta waves to energize Pals. It increases the work speed of Pals in the base. Placing more than one will not have additional effects.

Workbench.description: Primitive Workbench for producing simple items. Pals with Handiwork suitability help speed up production.

YakushimaBlade.description: [Terraria Collab] According to the legend, this sword was brought back from a distant land by Croajiro. Why? We have no idea...
